textos_fuente.text: Southern Lion – Where Shopping Goes Beyond Ordinary Skip to content METROLION Next Show Dates: 10/3/25 - 10/5/25 ABOUT Southern Lion Merchants Press & Media Gift Cards AMENITIES METROLION GALLERY CONTACT Menu ABOUT Southern Lion Merchants Press & Media Gift Cards AMENITIES METROLION GALLERY CONTACT We Are Southern Lion We welcome you to Southern Lion, one of the most extensive curated shopping experiences in the South. With over 100 merchants, we celebrate craftsmanship and a discerning eye for all things home decor. Our Story Gift Cards Our Story Gift Cards STORE HOURS Mon – Sat: 11:00am – 6:00pm Sun: 12:00pm – 6:00pm VISIT US 11033 Carolina Pl Pkwy Pineville, NC 28134 CONTACT US inquiry@southernlion.com (980) 500-8775 Sign Up For Our Newsletter Stay up to date with in-store events and our latest happenings! Email Phone Number SMS Opt In By signing up, you agree to receive marketing texts. Reply STOP to unsubscribe. Sign Up Going Beyond Ordinary Step into our home to shop for your home! While you peruse our aisles and grab a bite to eat, you’ll find friendly faces to greet you at every turn – making Southern Lion a truly unique experience. We welcome you to Southern Lion, where shopping goes beyond the ordinary. Explore Amenities Explore Amenities Southern Lion Cafe The Man Cave The Meeting Space The Design House Our Merchants Our Merchants Have Questions? Need assistance or have a question? Our friendly team is ready to help! Contact us via our contact form, give us a ring, or drop us an email. We’re here to provide support and answer any queries you may have. Contact Us Become a Merchant Ready to be a part of the Southern Lion family? Join us as a merchant and gain access to a growing customer base while you showcase your products, boost sales, and grow your brand. Get in touch to learn more about becoming a merchant today! Merchant Application Merchant Application Work at Southern Lion Looking to join our team? You’ll find a friendly work environment, competitive wages, and be a steward of a one-of-a-kind retail experience. Take the first step and apply today! Employee Application Employee Application “Southern Lion was filled with everything unique from A-Z. The staff was very friendly and helpful! I found a unique nutcracker that I can’t wait to display with my collection!” KIM E. STORE HOURS Mon – Sat: 11:00am – 6:00pm Sun: 12:00pm – 6:00pm VISIT US 11033 Carolina Pl Pkwy Pineville, NC 28134 CONTACT US inquiry@ southernlion.com (980) 500-8775 Closed for Easter Sunday As many of our families, clients, and customers take part in Spring Break festivities and Easter celebrations, Southern Lion will be closed on Easter Sunday in observance of this sacred day of reflection and renewal. Wishing you and your loved ones a joyful and blessed Easter! FRIDAY 18TH: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM SATURDAY 19TH: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM SUNDAY 20th: CLOSED

Here you can find one of 2,800+ USA Swimming clubs and hundreds of Learn to Swim programs to join the competitive side of the sport (indicated by blue pins on the map). Contact these programs directly to learn about the many options about how to join USA Swimming and enjoy swimming at any level! For more information on this map, please click here Finder Type USA Swimming Club Learn To Swim Club Excellence Level None Bronze Silver Gold Safe Sport Recognized Yes No FILTER HIDE FILTERS SWIM LESSON PROVIDER NETWORK To distinguish these providers, we designate them as part of USA Swimming’s Swim Lesson Provider Network, as these swim lesson providers go above and beyond to provide a safe environment and facility by using trained and certified instructors and
        lifeguards, low student to teacher ratios, and proven techniques and curricula to ensure a quality learning experience for every child. The benefits of being a part of USA Swimming’s Swim Lesson Provider Network are endless! Swim Lesson Providers are connected to local Water Safety Coalition networks and supporting organizations, and provided access to discounted or free materials
            and resources to use when hosting water safety events. Additionally, the USA Swimming Foundation has an annual grant fund for learn-to-swim providers who offer services to children who, otherwise, would not have the opportunity to participate
            swimming lessons.
